articles.title: Tearful Gauff argues with ump, loses at Olympics - ESPN India
articles.description: Coco Gauff was left in tears after getting into an extended argument with the chair umpire over a ruling during her loss to Donna Vekic in a Paris Olympics third-round singles match.
